text: Amber Midthunder (born April 26, 1997) is an American actress. She is known for her series regular roles in the FX series Legion, and The CW series Roswell, New Mexico. She also appeared in Longmire and Banshee. ==References== Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Native American people Category:American voice actors Category:1997 births
title: Amber Midthunder
